DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the rate of stroke and/or death in patients treated with the Wingspan Stent System, according to the Indications for Use, within 72 hours post procedure.
DOC.brief_title: Post Market Surveillance Study of the Wingspan Stent System
DOC.detailed_description: This research study is a Food and Drug Administration (FDA) mandated post market surveillance study of the Wingspan® Stent System, also known as the WEAVE™ Trial. The purpose of this trial is to fulfill a FDA requirement to evaluate the rate of stroke and/or death within 72 hours of the procedure, in patients who have a Wingspan Stent implanted in accordance with the Indications for Use.
DOC.criteria: All patients for whom treatment with the Wingspan Stent System is considered.
